meanings.definition: A person who is involved in or supports violent acts in the name of jihad.
meanings.sent1: The jehadi was arrested for planning a terrorist attack.
meanings.sent2: The jehadi group claimed responsibility for the bombing.
meanings.sent3: The jehadi tried to sneak a weapon into the country but got caught at the airport.
meanings.sent4: His radical beliefs turned him into a jehadi warrior.
meanings.sent5: The news reported the capture of a dangerous jehadi leader.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to violent acts carried out in the name of jihad.
meanings.sent1: The jehadi ideology promotes extremist views.
meanings.sent2: The region faced a wave of jehadi violence.
meanings.sent3: The jehadi propaganda was quickly debunked by experts.
meanings.sent4: The impact of the jehadi movement was felt across the globe.
meanings.sent5: The documentary shed light on the dark world of jehadi activities.
